name: Yates's Map of Lancashire (1786)
description: William Yates's large-scale county survey of Lancashire. The first accurate large-scale map of the county, surveyed 1774-1786.
notes:
William Yates (fl.1774-1786).
Scale: 1 inch to 1 mile. Surveyed using triangulation.
First truly accurate large-scale survey of Lancashire.
Shows Manchester in much more detail than earlier county maps.
Predates the Ordnance Survey by decades.
NLS has digitized version on Lancashire county maps page.
Highly sought after by collectors.
